abstract.p: Henri Leconte defeats Mats Wilander and Mikael Pernfors defeats Andres Gomez in LastMinuteTravel.com senior tennis championships (S)

block.p: Henri Leconte used power and elegance last night to reach today's final of the LastMinuteTravel.com senior championships, but Mikael Pernfors called on survival skills to win his semifinal in the oppressive afternoon heat. Leconte defeated Mats Wilander, 6-3, 7-5, on the clay court atop Wollman Rink in Central Park.
Pernfors was not feeling 100 percent, but the 36-year-old Swede scampered past Andres Gomez, 6-4, 7-6 (0), in searing conditions. He was more energetic than the 40-year-old Gomez.

Pernfors needed only one break point to win the first set. The players broke serve six consecutive games in the second set before Pernfors held for 5-5. Gomez became aggravated with his inability to string together two good games, and had no fight left in the tie breaker.
